seller_description: Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner effectively eliminates 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including the COVID-19 virus (SARS-CoV-2) on hard, non-porous surfaces in just 2 minutes (EPA Reg 777-66). This disinfecting spray not only provides a deep clean by eliminating germs, removing soap scum, and cutting through tough grease and grime but also deodorizes with a refreshing tropical Mango and Hibiscus scent. Versatile and convenient, it can be used on multiple hard surfaces throughout the home, including the kitchen and bathroom. As a trusted leader in disinfection, Lysol offers a range of great products, including disinfecting wipes, sprays, and all-purpose cleaners, for all your cleaning needs.
review: Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner is a vibrant addition to any cleaning routine, combining efficiency with a burst of tropical freshness! With its powerful formula that eliminates 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including COVID-19, it transforms cleaning into a breeze. Its Mango and Hibiscus scent invigorates your space, leaving a refreshing aroma behind. Whether tackling soap scum, grease, or everyday grime, this cleaner ensures a deep, thorough cleanse on multiple hard surfaces. It's not just a cleaner—it's a trusted ally in maintaining a sparkling, germ-free home.
Expected_output: The seller markets Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner as a highly effective disinfectant capable of killing 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including COVID-19, within two minutes on hard, non-porous surfaces. It is promoted as a versatile cleaning solution that tackles tough grease, soap scum, and grime while leaving behind a refreshing Mango and Hibiscus scent. The seller’s images accurately showcase the vibrant packaging, emphasizing key details such as its germ-killing effectiveness and tropical fragrance. The buyer’s image confirms the receipt of the exact product advertised, with the packaging, branding, and details identical to the seller’s representation. The product appears in excellent condition, with no visible discrepancies in labeling or quality. The absence of a buyer performance review limits additional insights into usability, but the perfect alignment between the seller’s claims and the buyer’s received product supports the seller’s reliability. In conclusion, the transaction demonstrates a successful fulfillment of the advertised features, with no observable faults. The combination of an appealing presentation, functional promises, and accurate delivery underscores the product’s value, making it likely to meet or exceed the buyer’s expectations.
label: -1: buyers opinion
